'''Oikeroi''' was a [[Cats|cat]] according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.

== History ==
He was a thane of [[Tevildo]], described as warlike and fierce, but he was killed by [[Huan]].<ref>{{LT2|I}}, pp. 27-8</ref> Huan gave the coat of Oikeroi to [[Lúthien]], who used it to disguise [[Beren]] on their [[Quest for the Silmaril|quest]] to retrieve a [[Silmaril]] from [[Melko]]. Oikeroi had previously spent a good deal of time about the hall of Melko, allowing Beren to pass unnoticed.<ref>{{LT2|I}}, pp. 30-2</ref>

In later writings, Beren was disguised in the coat of the great wolf [[Draugluin]], rather than the coat of Oikeroi.<ref>{{S|Beren}}</ref>
